title: Yahoo Lifestyle
text: People may feel quite enchanted and heartened by your words today. Youre not necessarily trying to beguile or bewitch; youre only seeking to accurately and clearly convey whats in your heart. Your manner of communication has a poetic feel to it now that mystical Neptune is creating an easygoing trine to articulate Mercury. Your delivery feels softer, because your mind is perhaps more pliable, brimming with empathy. Author Bill Bullard wrote, The highest form of knowledge is empathy. Get Your Complete Cosmic Profile
